body: Hi all, I've been using Honeybee for a while now to create daylight renders of spaces but I've noticed a problem with material exports with the new version of Honeybee. When I perform a simple box model the colours of the objects and the reflectance of the Glass are not taken into account. I re-ran it using an older version of honeybee and the simulation worked fine. See below the two separate images. I'm slightly concerned if the material export is incorrect for this simulation will it affect all other simulation types? Any help greatly appreciated [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/UIp6-tRQFlZMB2rU4zyiR-phCNNeH3Yj8mr2gGxjKbDMuYsYLK9Wk8x3UAzUK6rz5iA-z2Eft56TQL7SS*CC3LYsvTBjD1hv/HoneybeeVersion0.61.GIF) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/UIp6-tRQFlbMEhwUhhX3sMqI8HQVqE8IjWzep3c1gpgj1dKq4iJkPNprVrQkSnebPeHGNBNgE2Iw2lJI7PNDqb8Ed9GyvjqM/HoneybeeVersion0.59.GIF)
topic: Issues with Material Colours and reflectances with New honeybee

replies.body: It's working for me. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/-kyT3FDU5jclwm6O5b7pHL2EqyxZUVsul9c5ZC-otrIiVedrtHeRKkhUQo8z28o92S4tfJLxiYLqwIGEFakxV1sXueFW4K2N/415201734725PM.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/-kyT3FDU5je5KWcv*vB48lKPNG7iCn-gUIlF5wQcKBHkjDDHK2a7ZjY299pWV7oonMsApzNGuYDNy3EjrdM50aOhe8LUHxCk/415201734640PM.png)

Hi Sarith,

I tested your script on my pc and it worked perfectly. There must have been operator error somewhere in my previous script! Thank you very much for trying it out for me
